tweet: Thank you, @SenHydeSmith, for your leadership on this legislation. I am delighted and honored to join you in this effort to bring certainty to Mississippians in the Yazoo backwater area. #FinishThePumps #ForgottenBackwaterFlood https://twitter.com/SenHydeSmith/status/1156708121198415872 …

For too long, residents of the South Delta have suffered from flooding that could easily be prevented. Today I joined @SenHydeSmith to introduce legislation that would immediately overturn EPA’s veto of the Yazoo Backwater Pumps Project. #FinishThePumps https://www.wicker.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/2019/7/hyde-smith-wicker-introduce-bill-to-rein-in-clean-water-act-veto-authority …

I was delighted to join @SenHydeSmith today on the Senate floor to discuss the historic flooding in the South Delta. It's time to #FinishThePumps & bring certainty back to the thousands of Mississippians who continue to suffer in the Yazoo backwater area. https://youtu.be/zxoFn0zNk-0

5. If you see a child 👶 left in a car, call 911 🚨 immediately. #HotCars #ChildSafety
4. Check the backseat every time you leave your car 🚗. #HotCars #ChildSafety
3. When you leave your car, be sure to lock 🔒 it so your children do not climb inside and become trapped. #HotCars #ChildSafety
2. Make it a habit of leaving your cell phone 📱, briefcase 💼, or purse 👜 in the backseat close to your child’s car seat. #HotCars #ChildSafety
1. ❌ Never leave your child alone in the car for any period of time. #HotCars #ChildSafety
